It’s just a short walk to Capitola Village where you can enjoy restaurants, boutiques, galleries and the beach. The home includes a one car garage, one extra parking space and washer/dryer.

property_ids.rentoneonline: 102 l grand avenue - available monthly only

fields.title: 102 L Grand - Available Monthly
fields.description: Enjoy the sights and sounds from this English Tudor style two-bedroom, two-bath home vacation rental located in a prestigious neighborhood on Depot Hill. This beach house has spectacular panoramic ocean views and is within steps of the Capitola Village and beach. The views from this home are like living in a postcard. Imagine viewing the twinkling lights of Capitola every evening from your living room windows! This first floor beach house offers a living room and a separate great room area with fireplace that could be used as a third bedroom. A well-equipped kitchen and washer/dryer provide the ultimate in convenience. Enjoy this home in its pleasant private garden setting or BBQ with family. Great deck to enjoy beautiful views! Call us today to tour this beach house. 31 days or longer only. ~2000 Square Feet

fields.title: 1745 49th Ave. - Available Monthly ONLY
fields.description: This stunning 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home in Capitola is quite a gem. Located directly above Capitola Village, it is within walking distance to the beach, shopping and delicious cuisine. This updated home features a downstairs living room with separate dining room which leads to a large back patio/garden area. This is a fabulous recreational area with Jacuzzi tub, BBQ and plenty of seating. There is a separate bonus room in the garden which is great for the kids. May accept dogs. Upstairs there is a very spacious living room with fireplace, large screen TV and shuffle board game. The master bedroom, which is also upstairs, has a large private bathroom and balcony. There is plenty of parking at this beach house which is located just steps away from the famous Shadowbrook Restaurant.

fields.title: 109 #2 Monterey Avenue
fields.description: This lovely studio is located in the pristine Capitola Village. Enjoy all that this charming beach town has to offer. This spacious apartment is fully furnished and includes a full sized murphy bed and plenty of seating. It includes ample storage space and a small back patio. Parking space for one car is an added bonus.

fields.title: 410 Beverly - Available Monthly ONLY
fields.description: Charming and Cheerful home in a great location – the perfect combination for a memorable extended stay in Capitola Village by the Sea! This fully furnished, spacious tastefully decorated, single story home offers accommodations within walking distance of the beach, restaurants, shopping and nightlife of the Capitola Village. Beautifully landscaped yard with large patio ideally suited for special occasions, family gatherings and entertaining. An attached garage has space for one car, as well as parking in front of the home. ~1300 Square Feet

property_ids.rentoneonline: immaculate cabo home on the beach

fields.title: Cabo Hacienda Beach Club
fields.description: You can’t get any closer to the beach or town than this! Hacienda 2-301, part of the prestigious Hacienda Beach Club & Residences, is perfectly situated along the famous Playa el Medano and is surrounded by all the fun and excitement of downtown Cabo San Lucas. The home itself radiates with warmth and beauty. Inspired by the haciendas of Old Mexico, 2-301 features classic wood-beamed ceilings, colorful linens and furnishings, vibrant artwork and earthy cultural tiling throughout. In the living room, rattan chairs, comfy sofas and brightly-colored pillows and floor coverings create a relaxed ambiance that is warm and welcoming. Spacious, beautiful and functional, 2-301’s gourmet kitchen features a gorgeous tiled back splash, granite counter tops, rich wood cabinetry, top-quality stainless steel appliances and a four-seat breakfast bar. The dining space nearby offers a simple yet stylish place for guests to enjoy a casual meal together. Hacienda 2-301 has two master bedrooms with private baths, as well as a Queen Sofa pull-out in the living room and an additional Front gate deluxe electric self-inflating Queen bed perfect for accommodating couples or families. Hacienda 2-301 also offers a half-bath for easy access, and a full-sized washer and dryer. For those guests wishing to experience a truly relaxing stay, Hacienda offers housekeeping and laundry services, as well as gourmet dining by the beach and pool. This well-appointed hacienda looks out over the resort’s central courtyard and grand fountain, with the crystal blue waves of the Cortez glistening just beyond. Expansive recessed glass doors in the common living areas lead out to the veranda where a gas BBQ, alfresco dining for six, and relaxing lounge space invite guests to enjoy the refreshing sea breezes and beautiful vistas. Guests at Hacienda 2-301 also have access to the fabulous amenities at the beach club including the deluxe fitness center, massive infinity-edge pool with a swim-up bar and elevated Jacuzzi, and the many poolside lounge chairs and private lounge beds. Steps from the pool area, Hacienda’s parcel of the beach features manicured sands, lounge beds and bar service offering an ultra-posh beach setting. The resort also has an indulgent spa that offers full spa services, including facials, massages, wraps, manicures, and pedicures. After a relaxing spa treatment, guests can enjoy time in the steam and sauna, followed by a quick (and refreshing) dip in the cold-water plunge. All spa services are located right on the grounds of Hacienda. Full concierge services and friendly staff will help ensure that you and your guests have a memorable stay at Hacienda Beach Club and in Los Cabos. The ideal getaway for those seeking the best of both worlds, Hacienda 2-301 has the beautiful Sea of Cortez at its doorstep with all the fabulous shopping, fine dining, and vibrant nightlife of Cabo San Lucas only minutes away!

fields.title: 1591 Prospect *Available Monthly ONLY
fields.description: Come stay a month or more in this darling 2 bedrooms, plus loft, 2 bath vacation rental located on Prospect Avenue in the prestigious Jewel Box area of Capitola. Soak in the sun on the ocean view balcony or enjoy a few minute stroll to the village to dine in one of Capitola’s many fine and casual restaurants. Make sure to check out the shops, wonderful boutiques and galleries. This fully furnished vacation beach home has a one car garage, darling well manicured front and back yards, fireplace, dishwasher, washer/dryer, spacious living area and much more. DSL available.

fields.title: Cambridge Cottage - Available Monthly ONLY
fields.description:
This lovely historic beach house is tucked away on a quiet one way lane in the heart of Santa Cruz, California. Built in 1888, Cambridge Cottage is one of a few remaining cottages of Seabright Resort established in the later part of the 19th century. The latest amenities and environmentally sensitive fixtures and fittings have been incorporated into the design while respecting the ambiance and architecture. The under drive garage gives the home the feel of a coach house with all the related charm and privacy You will experience high ceilings, classic light fixtures, original glass windows and wall finishes. The lounge and dining area overlook Tyrell Park from the second level and a view toward the sea at Castle Beach. 
The master bed room adjacent the living area is generous in proportions with a classic styled white washed queen size bed. The views from the bed room include the historic Museum of Natural History and Tyrell Park. The sunny kitchen facing east overlooks a private court yard. This little jewel of an outdoor room offers a sanctuary for lounging, dining, and barbequing with the sound of the sea as background.. A delightful petite second bedroom with the court yard view features custom built in day bed that converts to a king bed as needed. Within walking distance there is a great choice of restaurants. At low tide you can walk all along the beach to the boardwalk and even venture on to the city centre.

~650 Square Feet

fields.title: 212 Cherry Avenue - Available Monthly ONLY
fields.description: This 3 bedroom, 2-1/2 bath vacation rental has spectacular ocean and village views from the newly constructed rooftop deck, as well as from the living area. This beach house is located in a quieter residential neighborhood, has one bedroom with its own private sitting room area separate from the remainder of the home, a great patio area for BBQs and gatherings, large living room with fireplace, washer/dryer, TVs and more. This vacation rental is perfect for large family or corporate retreats. This wonderful home is just a short stroll to all that Capitola Village has to offer.  Available by the month only. ~2390 Square Feet.
